title.rendered: IND vs AUS 2022: Jaspreet Bumrah set to be included in India’s playing XI for 2nd T20 in Nagpur

content.rendered:
According to a report, aiming to balance India’s first loss the Paces pear head Jasprit Bumrah is set to be included in the national team’s playing XI for the next T20 against Australia that is scheduled to be played on September September 23 in Nagpur. Despite scoring 208 runs, India lost the first T20 by 4 wickets against Australia on September 20 in Mohali.

Experts think that it happened only due to India’s bowling in the death overs. Bhuvneshwar Kumar, who is currently out of his form after India’s first match against Pakistan in the recently concluded Asia Cup 2022, gave 15 runs off his 17th over and spent 0-52 runs in 4 overs.

Read also:IND vs AUS 3rd T20: Stampede breaks out among fans purchasing tickets in Hyderabad, several injured in lathicharge
